Articles.Content: I have no mods and i just freshly installed KSP! I have no Hamachi installed on my PC. Help please! i need quick answers!
Please put your output_log.txt (it's in KSP_Data) on a site like dropbox or pastebin for us, we'll see what's up
What are you calling "freaking slow" ? If it's a loading time of a few minutes, it is (somewhat) normal in lower-end PCs, talking from experience here.
After it loads, is the game really slow? Because if it is, bad computer specs/bloatware is the culprit.
As said before, bad HDD or bloatware. Try SSD, it reduced my loading speed from about a minute to several seconds.
